subject: Re: [junit] OT: OO Newcomer
msgSnippet: ... I realize you re looking for literature, but there s nothing quite like pairing up with someone who knows OO.  They can help cast the theory into reality
messageBody:
mamago@... wrote:

>OFF TOPIC
>Disclaimer: see below
>
>Bringing a newbie into OO
>=========================
>
>I would like to ask the people on this list for recommendations of the best
>literature to bring an OO newbie up to speed.
>
>

I realize you're looking for literature, but there's nothing quite like
pairing up with someone who knows OO. They can help cast the theory
into reality quickly, while answering specific questions. I'll bet
there's a willing mentor lurking somewhere near you.

Mike
